attributes.action: Consider banning any new developments for any religous institutions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would the Government to Ban any new building projects for any religous society or group.  Given the current climate and the tensions between groups and people from different ethnic backgounds and beliefs, building new churches can only seen as trying to devide the british people even more...

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
